titleInfo.title: Jimmie Dale Gilmore Labor Day Weekend Extravaganza

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and green on yellow) announcing a Labor Day Weekend Extravaganza featuring Jimmie Dale Gilmore, Old 97's and Dale Watson at the House of Blues on August 29, Rockefeller's on August 30, Deep Ellum Live on August 31, and The Backyard on September 1. Poster features a woodcut of a jockey riding a horse and the phrase "I'm goin', Are you?"

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
